wiki.content:
Arguably two of the best rappers to ever touch a mic are put together to kill one track. A natural combination, as their rhyme schemes are closely patterned, creatively pound lyric after lyric mimicking fully automatic machine gun fire. Although posthumously recorded there is nothing put pure life exploding through your speaker.  
        
User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License and may also be available under the GNU FDL.

tag.name: da real old skool hip hop
